summary: This is an internal email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding the handling of Epstein-related Touhy requests on the civil side, requesting that letters from the law firm Steptoe be passed along.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who will be handling Epstein-related Touhy requests on the civil side and requests that letters from Steptoe be passed along.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: The office location of the Assistant United States Attorney sending the email.

locations.name: New York, New York 10007
locations.context: The specific location/address associated with the Southern District of New York office.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY is handling Epstein-related Touhy requests on the civil side as of August 2019.
The email references receiving letters from the law firm Steptoe regarding these requests.
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings or information requests related to Epstein in the civil court system.
